oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Sing For Your Supper - 1949-mm-dd
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM program Sing For Your Supper, featuring Owen Bradley and the Skyriders, Snooky Lanson, Dottie Dillard, and announcer Grant Turner. Sponsored by American Ace coffee.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Snooky Lanson; Dottie Dillard; Owen Bradley; Skyriders
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: American Ace jingle (Minnie Pearl) -- Theme (Sing For Your Supper) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Snooky Lanson) -- Careless Hands (Snooky Lanson) -- American Ace commercial (Snooky Lanson, Grant Turner) -- Snooky Lanson and Dottie Dillard talk -- Put Your Shoes On, Lucy (Dottie Dillard) -- Snooky Lanson and Dottie Dillard talk -- It Had To Be You (Owen Bradley and the Skyriders) -- Snooky Lanson talks -- Once And For Always (Snooky Lanson) -- American Ace commercial (Grant Turner, Snooky Lanson, Dottie Dillard) -- Need You (Dottie Dillard, Snooky Lanson) -- Closing statement (Snooky Lanson, Dottie Dillard) -- Theme (Sing For Your Supper) -- Closing statement (Grant Turner) -- American Ace jingle (Minnie Pearl) -- Swift jingle (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Sing for your supper (Radio program); Turner, Grant; Bradley, Owen; Skyriders (Musical group); Lanson, Snooky; Dillard, Dottie; Minnie Pearl
